data.title: Meet Our Executive Team — tevixMD
data.meta_description: At tevixMD, we understand the value of simplified, error-free and reliable billing & collections procedures.
data.text:
Stephen Passalacqua

Chief Executive Officer

Stephen is a seasoned healthcare technology executive with a comprehensive background in revenue generation, customer development, services delivery and business operations. He has claimed his spot at the forefront of innovation in both healthcare and financial verticals with nearly 30 years of experience in enterprise software, cloud based SaaS, and professional service delivery businesses. Stephen’s leadership abilities have been exemplified at growth stage and Fortune 500 organizations.

Jim Montgomery

Chief Technology Officer

Jim is an IT executive with 20+ yrs. experience implementing innovative technical business solutions and has proven his vision and hands-on knowledge of the many technologies required to guide the tevixMD developers in the US, Costa Rica and India. Jim and his team design, build, test and maintain all products. He is a seasoned developer with experience with state-of-the-art technologies and vast experience with database development tools and network security.

Christina Cuartas

Vice President, Client Success

Christina has a proven track record in operational excellence with more than 15 years of knowledge in the lab industry. As an Operational Excellence Analyst with BioReference Laboratories, she was a key member to a team that identified waste and drove growth in the company. She recommends best practices to align with the goals of any corporation. This process has made the Client Success approach at tevixMD repetitively successful across our client base, increasing their revenue.

Martin Pearson

Vice President, Finance

Martin brings over 20 years of experience as a financial executive with small and growth-focused technology companies. His expertise lies in the SaaS, mobile, tech-enabled, and healthcare technology sectors. As a financial executive he has leveraged his expertise to drive growth, optimize resources, and ensure financial excellence. Previously, he held key financial leadership roles at Appforge (acquired by Oracle), Better World Books, SimplifyMD (acquired by Azalea Health), and ORTEC. Martin's comprehensive skill set spans financial, administrative, human resources, and internal systems development functions.

Ronald Miller

Vice President, Marketing

Ron has a strong track record of delivering business growth, and is an accomplished Sales, Marketing and Client Management Executive with more than 30 years of proven performance. Prior to tevixMD, he was a Business Optimization Manager for a McKesson Division that managed Physician Infusion Centers including responsibility for the Full Revenue Cycle.

Darryl Berryhill

Vice President, Business Development

Darryl holds over 20 years of experience in the clinical laboratory and medical IT industry including experience in business development, business operations, and strategy with a primary focus on the acquisition and retention of new and existing medical-related clientele. His time spent with national and regional clinical and specialty laboratories, revenue cycle management teams, billing companies, and urgent care centers brings real-world knowledge into the business he supports.

William Todd Andros

Board Member

Todd is the inventor & primary developer of all current and future products awaiting implementation. He has 20+ yrs. experience in healthcare and 30+ years in Electronic Engineering focusing on tech design, implementation and product development/life cycle in the computer and telecommunications industries. He holds 3 US Patents. Prior to working at tevixMD, he was Vice President of Marketing and Product Planning for Equitrac Corporation. Prior to that he held positions of increasing responsibility at Telefind Corporation, Siemens Information Systems and Mitel Corporation.
